snippet.title: Hue Hooligans — Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Hue Hooligans is a puzzle-platformer video game where you use phone booths to switch between characters, each one with a unique ability.

WISHLIST ON STEAM:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3310930/Hue_Hooligans/?beta=1

JOIN DISCORD:
https://discord.gg/kXhb24mjTd

VISIT WEBSITE:
https://HueHooligans.com
